      • drawText

        public java.awt.Shape drawText​(Style style,
                               DrawingPoint at,
                               java.lang.String text)
        Draws the given string at the x, y position relative to the top left. Unlike Graphics.drawString(String, int, int), the y position is offset by the height of the text, minus the descent of the font. This puts the top left corner of the text at the given x, y position, rather than the bottom left corner.
        Specified by:
        drawText in interface DrawingSurface
